Change has been successfully rebased and submitted as 3dd6c2255e5adf02e85c6eb1662993df02c545d2
We need to use HOST_INSTANCES to generate this instead of hard-coding 4.

Updated PS. But facing CI issue. 

There is reference for yaml templates. Is there any reference for json templates ?
For json templates, need to do lot of regex/ string manipulations. We had sample json file and updated .bbappend in latest PS. 
CI repotest failed due to json format/syntax issue. 
To Fix this json syntax issue, Need to do some complex logic changes required to this string manipulation. Is there any better way to do this ?
Why is this not a template service?
Template service is not required as we are using same service file for all the hosts.
Please follow (and update) the conventions in docs/designs/device-tree-gpio-naming, so that these presence pin names are consistently named across all our systems.
This is the same file?  Please figure out how to generate them.
Please use 4 space indentation on JSON.
Why are we doing this extra echo?  Just run `busctl call ...` directly, right?
Why are we overwriting the variable instead of appending it?
I don't really understand what you attempted to align with here.
Why are these FILES necessary if they're already in SYSTEMD_SERVICE?  Doesn't that handle it already?

Removed FILES:${PN} += "/lib/systemd/system/phosphor-gpio-monitor@.service"
and Keeping FILES only for obmc-ipmb-rescan-fru.service as it needed to avoid some build issues.
